attributes.action: Name London's New Garden Bridge 'Lumley Bridge'
attributes.additional_details:
Joanna Lumley has worked tirelessly for 15 years to get this project off the ground, and the 'Garden Bridge' will finally open in 2018, bringing a stunning new landmark to the capital. An open space spanning the Thames, a place of relaxation and tranquility in the heart of the city, all because of one woman's vision. And she's a National Treasure - the least we can all do is name her dream after her.

Therefore we propose that the official name of the new bridge be 'Lumley Bridge'.
